content.1: And the whole earth was of one language, and of one speech.
content.2: And it came to pass, as they journeyed from the east, that they found a plain in the land of Shinar; and they dwelt there.
content.3: And they said one to another, Go to, let us make brick, and burn them throughly. And they had brick for stone, and slime had they for morter.
content.4: And they said, Go to, let us build us a city and a tower, whose top
content.7: Go to, let us go down, and there confound their language, that they may not understand one another’s speech.
content.9: Therefore is the name of it called Babel; because the
content.11: And Shem lived after he begat Arphaxad five hundred years, and begat sons and daughters.
content.12: And Arphaxad lived five and thirty years, and begat Salah:
content.13: And Arphaxad lived after he begat Salah four hundred and three years, and begat sons and daughters.
content.14: And Salah lived thirty years, and begat Eber:
content.15: And Salah lived after he begat Eber four hundred and three years, and begat sons and daughters.
content.16: And Eber lived four and thirty years, and begat Peleg:
content.17: And Eber lived after he begat Peleg four hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters.
content.18: And Peleg lived thirty years, and begat Reu:
content.19: And Peleg lived after he begat Reu two hundred and nine years, and begat sons and daughters.
content.20: And Reu lived two and thirty years, and begat Serug:
content.21: And Reu lived after he begat Serug two hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters.
content.22: And Serug lived thirty years, and begat Nahor:
content.23: And Serug lived after he begat Nahor two hundred years, and begat sons and daughters.
content.24: And Nahor lived nine and twenty years, and begat Terah:
content.25: And Nahor lived after he begat Terah an hundred and nineteen years, and begat sons and daughters.
content.26: And Terah lived seventy years, and begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran.
content.28: And Haran died before his father Terah in the land of his nativity, in Ur of the Chaldees.
content.29: And Abram and Nahor took them wives: the name of Abram’s wife
content.31: And Terah took Abram his son, and Lot the son of Haran his son’s son, and Sarai his daughter in law, his son Abram’s wife; and they went forth with them from Ur of the Chaldees, to go into the land of Canaan; and they came unto Haran, and dwelt there.
content.32: And the days of Terah were two hundred and five years: and Terah died in Haran.
